title: 'Offensive' poster branding Angela Merkel a 'kraut' sparks row between Brexiteers
text:
A controversial tweet branding Angela Merkel a “kraut" has caused a wave of infighting between leading Brexiteers, as the chairman of the Brexit Party said it damaged “all Leavers”.

The Leave.EU campaign, formed by Arron Banks for the 2016 referendum, on Tuesday posted a photo of Ms Merkel with her hand raised aloft in a pose not dissimilar to a Nazi salute.

The caption referenced a Number 10 briefing that suggested a deal was “impossible” by October 31 following a phone call between the German Chancellor and Prime Minister Boris Johnson.

The post was seen on Twitter by almost four million people, and read: “We didn’t win two World Wars to be pushed around by a kraut”.

Prominent Brexiteers including...
description: A controversial tweet branding Angela Merkel a “kraut" has caused a wave of infighting between leading Brexiteers, as the chairman of the Brexit Party said it damaged “all Leavers”.
